connectivity/action_requires_connection: The requested action requires an active network connection
export/body: Here is my data from Sharebibles
export/generic_error: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
export/no_email_error: You do not have an email application! Please install one so you can export your data.
feedback/feedback_error: Unable to launch mail app. Send feedback manually to {{email}}
invites/error: There was an issue accepting your invite, please try again and/or contact {{email}}
locationData/incorrect_region: Location is not within your current region!
onboarding/1_description: Welcome to ShareBibles! Let's walk you through a couple of the main features of the app to get you started!
onboarding/2_description:
To add a new location, simply click the 'add' button in the bottom left or long press anywhere on the map! Then use the menu to create a location!
Try it now!
onboarding/4_description: Congratulations on adding your first location! Try clicking on the pin to view its details!
onboarding/6_description: As you can see, the pin callout will show you information about that location you created. As well as if it is stored locally or has been pushed to the cloud as indicated by the icon in the top right corner!
onboarding/7_description:
You will notice that your location has not been uploaded. To be able to upload your locations and see locations that other people have added you must accept an invitation code given out by an administrator.
Lets go and accept one now!
onboarding/8_description: To get started accepting an invitation open the side drawer by clicking the highlighted button.
onboarding/9_description: Now click the 'Accept Invite' item in the drawer.
onboarding/10_description: Use the camera to scan the QR code from your administrator and then click the accept button in the bottom right.
onboarding/12_description: Awesome! Now that you have accepted an invite you will see the 'region' you currently have access to in place of the 'Share Invite' button. Also, any future locations you add will be automatically uploaded as long as you have a internet connection!
onboarding/13_description: You now know how to use the main features of the ShareBibles app! God bless you as you distribute Bibles to the nations!
onboarding/move_pin_hint: Try long pressing and then dragging the pin to fine tune its position.
permissions/camera/requesting: Can we please use your camera to accept invitations?
permissions/camera/denied: Enable the camera in settings to allow invites via QR code.
settings/not_implemented: Sorry this feature isn't available yet.
settings/push_locations_message: Pushing location data will send all locally stored location data to the central database for others to access. Would you like to push your data?
settings/shareInvite: Share a Share Bibles Access Code
validation/unknown_error_message: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
